page_name: 品牌授权模板_跨境专用_
title: 一、旗舰店授权模板​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/全球购/实施细则/品牌授权模板_跨境专用_.html
summary: 这是一份旗舰店授权模板，用于授权公司在全球范围内开设旗舰店，销售品牌商品并进行相关营销活动。授权期间为自指定日期至指定日期，被授权公司在贵司运营的跨境电子商务平台上使用授权商标开设旗舰店、售卖品牌商品和进行相关营销活动。同时，公司承诺不会在授权期间内在贵司平台上开设或授权他人开设授权品牌旗舰店，并已阅读并理解贵司平台上的规则与规范，将确保被授权人遵守。
text: 一、旗舰店授权模板旗舰店独占授权书Letter of Exclusive Authorizationfor Setting up a Brand Flagship Store致： 优选海购（澳门）有限公司（”贵司”）To：Global Premium Buy  (Macau) Limited（“You”）We/I, hereby certify that [Please insert the trademark owner's full name of the company or person], as the registrant and applicant of [Please insert the BRAND NAME corresponding with the trademark certificate attached](the "Trademark"), are entitled to use and license the Trademark with full power and authority.我司/我，【请填入授权公司或个人名称】，是【请填入与商标注册证明文件所载一致的授权品牌名称】（“授权商标”）的注册人和申请人，有权对授权商标进行使用和许可。We/I, hereby certify that we irrevocably and exclusively authorize [Please insert the company name of the licensee], a company registered at [Please insert the registered address of the Licensee] (the "Licensee"), to use the Trademark to set up a flagship store, sell the Trademark branded products, and conduct relevant marketing activities on the cross-border E-commerce platform operated by your company ( your "Platform"), from [Please insert the effective date of the authorization] to [Please insert the expiring date of the authorization] (the "Authorization Period").我司/我，在此声明，自【请填入授权生效日期】至【请填入授权失效日期】（“授权期间”），我司/我不可撤销地、独家地授权【请填入被授权方公司名称】，一家注册地址为【请填入被授权方公司注册地址】的公司（“被授权人”），在贵司运营的跨境电子商务平台（以下简称“贵司平台”）上使用授权商标开设旗舰店、售卖授权商标品牌商品和进行相关营销活动。We/I hereby represent and warrant that we will not set up, or authorize any other party to set up, any other flagship store with the Trademark on your Platform during the Authorization Period.我们在此声明和承诺，授权期间内我们不会在贵司平台上开设，或授权他人开设授权品牌旗舰店。We/I hereby further represent and warrant that we/I have read and understood the rules and guidelines published and announced on your Platform, and will make reasonable efforts to ensure the Licensee's compliance.我们进一步声明和承诺，我们已阅读并理解贵司平台上公布和公示的规则与规范，并将尽合理努力确保被授权人遵守。This letter of authorization is written in Chinese and English. In case of any inconsistency between Chinese version and English version, the Chinese version shall prevail.本授权书以中文和英文书就，中英文版本如有冲突，应以中文版为准。For and on behalf of兹代表Trademark Owner：[Please insert the full name of the Trademark Owner]商标所有人：【请填入商标所有人的全名】Signature:签字：(Company's Seal, if any)（公司盖章，如有）Authorised Signatory授权签字人签字Print Name：[insert full name of signatory]全名：【请填入授权签字人全名】Title：[insert title of signatory]职位：【请填入授权签字人的职位】Email: [Insert the email address of the Trademark Owner]邮箱：【请填入商标所有人的邮箱地址】Date:日期：Tips：填写要求：1.一级授权，且该授权需为独占授权；The authorization letter shall be issued by the Trademark owner, and the authorization shall be exclusive.2.授权文件剩余有效期需大于2个月；The Authorization Period shall be more than2months.3.如商标权利人为自然人，应提供其经公证的身份证明材料。如商标权利人为法律实体，应提供公司所在注册机关出具的公司注册文件。If the Trademark owner is an individual, please attach a certified true copy of his or her I.D. card/Passport with his/her original signature.If the Trademark owner is a legal entity, please attach a copy of the company registration document issued by a competent authority.

page_name: 品牌授权模板_跨境专用_
title: 二、专卖店授权模板​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/全球购/实施细则/品牌授权模板_跨境专用_.html
summary: 这是一份专卖店授权书模板，由优选海购（澳门）有限公司授权给Global Premium Buy（Macau）有限公司在他们的跨境电子商务平台上开设专卖店，销售品牌商品并进行相关营销活动。授权期间为从指定日期至指定日期。被授权方需遵守贵司平台的规定和规范。
text: 二、专卖店授权模板专卖店授权书Authorization Letterfor Setting up an Exclusive Store致： 优选海购（澳门）有限公司（”贵司”）To：Global Premium Buy  (Macau) Limited（“You”）We/I, hereby certify that [Please insert the Authorizer's full name of the company or person], is the registrant and applicant of [Please insert the BRAND NAME corresponding with the trademark certificate attached](the "Trademark"), or is duly authorized by the Trademark owner to use and license the Trademark with full power and authority (the "Authorizer").我司/我，【请填入授权公司或个人名称】，是【请填入与商标注册证明文件所载一致的授权品牌名称】（“授权商标”）的【注册人和申请人】或【经注册人和申请人正当授权，有权对授权商标进行使用和许可】("授权人")。We/I, hereby certify that we irrevocably authorize [Please insert the company name of the licensee], a company registered at [Please insert the registered address of the Licensee] (the "Licensee"), to use the Trademark to set up an exclusive store, sell the Trademark branded products, and conduct relevant marketing activities on the cross-border E-commerce platform with the domain address operated by your company ( your "Platform"), from [Please insert the effective date of the authorization] to [Please insert the expiring date of the authorization] (the "Authorization Period").我司/我，在此声明，自【请填入授权生效日期】至【请填入授权失效日期】（“授权期间”），我司/我不可撤销地授权【请填入被授权方公司名称】，一家注册地址为【请填入被授权方公司注册地址】的公司（“被授权人”），在贵司运营的跨境电子商务平台（以下简称“贵司平台”）上使用授权商标开设专卖店、售卖授权商标品牌商品和进行相关营销活动。We/I hereby further represent and warrant that we/I have read and understood the rules and guidelines published and announced on your Platform, and will make reasonable efforts to ensure the Licensee's compliance.我们进一步声明和承诺，我们已阅读并理解贵司平台上公布和公示的规则与规范，并将尽合理努力确保被授权人遵守。This letter of authorization is written in Chinese and English. In case of any inconsistency between Chinese version and English version, the Chinese version shall prevail.本授权书以中文和英文书就，中英文版本如有冲突，应以中文版为准。For and on behalf of兹代表Authorizer：[Please insert the full name of the Authorizer]授权人：【请填入授权人的全名】Signature:签字：(Company's Seal, if any)（公司盖章，如有）Authorised Signatory授权签字人签字Print Name：[insert full name of signatory]全名：【请填入授权签字人全名】Title：[insert title of signatory]职位：【请填入授权签字人的职位】Email：[Insert the email address of the Authorizer]邮箱：【请填入授权人的邮箱地址】Date:日期：Tips：填写要求：1.一级授权The authorization letter shall be issued by the Trademark owner.2.授权文件剩余有效期需大于2个月The Authorization Period shall be more than2months.3.如授权人为自然人，应提供其经公证的身份证明材料。如授权人为法律实体，应提供公司所在注册机关出具的公司注册文件。If the Authorizer is an individual, please attach a certified true copy of his or her I.D. card/Passport with his/her original signature.If the Authorizer is a legal entity, please attach a copy of the company registration document issued by a competent authority.

page_name: 品牌授权模板_跨境专用_
title: 三、专营店授权模板​
page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/抖音电商规则中心/全球购/实施细则/品牌授权模板_跨境专用_.html
summary: 这是一份专营店授权模板，由优选海购（澳门）有限公司授权给Global Premium Buy（澳门）有限公司在他们的跨境电子商务平台上使用其商标开设专营店、售卖品牌商品和进行相关营销活动，授权期限为从[请填入授权生效日期]至[请填入授权失效日期]。被授权方需遵守贵司平台规则，并确保被授权人遵守。
text: 三、专营店授权模板专营店授权书Authorization Letterfor Setting up an Franchise Store致： 优选海购（澳门）有限公司（”贵司”）To：Global Premium Buy  (Macau) Limited（“You”）We/I, hereby certify that [Please insert the Authorizer's full name of the company or person], is the registrant and applicant of [Please insert the BRAND NAME corresponding with the trademark certificate attached](the "Trademark"), or is duly authorized by the Trademark owner to use and license the Trademark with full power and authority (the "Authorizer").我司/我，【请填入授权公司或个人名称】，是【请填入与商标注册证明文件所载一致的授权品牌名称】（“授权商标”）的【注册人和申请人】或【经注册人和申请人正当授权，有权对授权商标进行使用和许可】("授权人")。We/I, hereby certify that we irrevocably authorize [Please insert the company name of the licensee], a company registered at [Please insert the registered address of the Licensee] (the "Licensee"), to use the Trademark to set up a franchise store, sell the Trademark branded products, and conduct relevant marketing activities on the cross-border E-commerce platform with the domain address operated by your company ( your "Platform"), from [Please insert the effective date of the authorization] to [Please insert the expiring date of the authorization] (the "Authorization Period").我司/我，在此声明，自【请填入授权生效日期】至【请填入授权失效日期】（“授权期间”），我司/我不可撤销地授权【请填入被授权方公司名称】，一家注册地址为【请填入被授权方公司注册地址】的公司（“被授权人”），在贵司运营的跨境电子商务平台（以下简称“贵司平台”）上使用授权商标开设专营店、售卖授权商标品牌商品和进行相关营销活动。We/I hereby further represent and warrant that we/I have read and understood the rules and guidelines published and announced on your Platform, and will make reasonable efforts to ensure the Licensee's compliance.我们进一步声明和承诺，我们已阅读并理解贵司平台上公布和公示的规则与规范，并将尽合理努力确保被授权人遵守。This letter of authorization is written in Chinese and English. In case of any inconsistency between Chinese version and English version, the Chinese version shall prevail.本授权书以中文和英文书就，中英文版本如有冲突，应以中文版为准。For and on behalf of兹代表Authorizer：[Please insert the full name of the Authorizer]授权人：【请填入授权人的全名】Signature:签字：(Company's Seal, if any)（公司盖章，如有）Authorised Signatory授权签字人签字Print Name：[insert full name of signatory]全名：【请填入授权签字人全名】Title：[insert title of signatory]职位：【请填入授权签字人的职位】Email：[Insert the email address of the Authorizer]邮箱：【请填入授权人的邮箱地址】Date:日期：Tips：填写要求：1.商标权利人到开店主体的授权链路需在三级以内，举例：A(商标权利人)→B→C→D(开店主体)The authorization letter shall be issued by the Trademark owner, a person/legal entity authorized by the Trademark owner ("Authorized Person"), or a person/legal entity authorized by the Authorized Person. e.g., A (trademark owner)→B（a person/legal entity authorized by A）→C（a person/legal entity authorized by B）→D（the Licensee）2.授权文件剩余有效期需大于2个月The Authorization Period shall be more than2months.3.如授权人为自然人，应提供其经公证的身份证明材料。如商标权利人为法律实体，应提供公司所在注册机关出具的公司注册文件。If the Authorizer is an individual, please attach a certified true copy of his or her I.D. card/Passport with his/her original signature.If the Authorizer is a legal entity, please attach a copy of the company registration document issued by a competent authority.
